reviews.review_msg: Non-fence, but his lectures can be quite boring sometimes. I noticed a lot ppl who fall asleep in his class. Don't pay attention during lectures? No problem. He has excellent online slide show notes. Just highlight the important points, turn them into flash cards, and then MEMORIZE them. I did that, and I got quite a good mark.

Amazing prof. Great course content. He keeps things interesting for a 3 hour lecture and sometimes lets us off early too! He's reasonable and always has interesting things to talk about in this lecture. Highly recommend!
Boring useless lectures, hard midterm and final. Do not take this class unless you absolutely need it.
